public class For<P,R>
extends DecoratorFunction<P,R>

A (recursive) functional for-loop.

          This class provides a Function that expects an Integer-Object as its input and returns the increment.

Constructor Detail

For

public For(Predicate<? super P> predicate,
           Function<? super P,? extends T> f1,
           Function<? super P,? extends R> f2,
           Function<? super T,? extends P> newState)
Constructs a new Object of this class.

Type Parameters:
T - the return type of the function f1 and the parameter type of the function newState.
Parameters:
predicate - the Predicate that determines whether f1 is called recursively.
f1 - code to be executed if predicate returns true, general contract: has to return arguments for newState.
f2 - code to be executed if predicate returns false.
newState - computes new arguments for consequent call of f1.
